storyInfo: Jara heads off Silence. Kal'tsit heads off the 'Preserver.' A beam of light rises from Trimounts.

attributes.content: I order you to answer me, attendant.
...Dr. {@nickname} is an amnesiac. The Doctor is not one among those you recognize—not anymore.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: The Doctor is now one of Terra. One of Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: And we have experienced a great deal together, up to this very day.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: ...Rhodes Island?
(Unknown language) Rhodes Island?
I see.
Fine, then, 'amnesiac.' So why did not you relate everything once again to this... 'Doctor'?
Ah, I see now.
You've always had your doubts about this 'Doctor's' true nature. You'd rather trust one relearning about the world, when the alternative is to recover a stretch of memories you deem unreliable.
Yes... quite understandable. None of what's happened on the ground can be forgery, and if there had been sufficient intervention, Terra wouldn't be in the state it is now.
It seems not a thing has gone as we hoped. Even if you don't remember that... Dr. {@nickname}.
What a rare chance this is. To meet the two of you, here. Yet under these conditions...
Well, then. 'Dr. {@nickname}' the amnesiac, and AMa-10 claiming the name Kal'tsit. What did you come here for?
Has Kristen put nerves in you? Has all this flown beyond your grasp?

attributes.options: I don't think you've answered me yet.;Quit posturing at us like that!;Level discussions start with self-introductions.

attributes.content: I am a devised personality simulation. For tens of thousands of years I have guarded this dark hall, and the ice cold bodies of hundreds of thousands of our people.
I once was our last hope, a pessimistic attempt, a synonym for nihilism.
But right now, perhaps to you insignificantly miniscule two... I am the accessory to and the invisible hand behind Kristen's mad plan.
I am the 'Preserver' with a foot in the grave. Revere all that lies before you. I am the dying of Civilization itself.
Position correct, Transmitter response... extremely strong...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Jara...?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why are you here?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You made it here by my blessing. Such is life.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You... came to stop me.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You haven't let go of that weapon I gave you. I'm delighted.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It doesn't seem like you're here on some hot-headed impulse, either.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: This is your very last chance, child.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Withdraw, or continue?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I will... learn to be the warrior you described, Director Jara.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, you're fully aware that Kristen is not about to target any town in the land with H.A.M.H.R.R.'s received energy.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You have no need to stop her.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Like any scientist would, she is preparing to go where none have set foot before, and that's all.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Perhaps so, Director Jara.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I certainly don't know Control like you do, but if you say so, I am willing to believe it.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: However, I will continue to attempt to bring a stop to all this, and I will make no exception, even if you're the one that stands in my way.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Why?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Because—whatever this experiment is, if Control freely conducts it, and succeeds in it—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And this being the Control of Rhine Lab, we all know, whether out of emotional confidence or rational judgment, that she is very likely to succeed—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: —What do you think the researchers of Columbia are going to see in her?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: After holding your job in Rhine Lab Human Resources Investigation for so long, you would know the people here inside and out.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...A hero.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Kristen would become a hero and an idol throughout all of Columbian science.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Yes. She'll become the scientist's paragon, the benchmark of a researcher.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And then, the floodgates will be open forever.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Item after item, project after project, researchers will be in perpetual delight.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But, Director Jara, only she is Kristen Wright. Only her.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: And the others? The ones bragging about themselves as geniuses and leaders? The ones inspired by this 'pioneer spirit by any means necessary?'
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The ones who'll put their own obsessions and ideals into practice, all without the slightest apprehension?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: The greedy, the egotistical, the overreaching, the stubborn, the ones like us?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: If they take the conduct of Rhine Lab's Control to be a virtue—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Then that—is a future I am sure you can imagine the shape of.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Perhaps we don't even need to imagine...
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: With the research you yourself conducted on Rhine Lab, you've never been in the dark.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I know very well, Silence.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I know very well how much of that kind of thing has happened, and is happening inside Trimounts—no, within the borders of Columbia.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: There have been plenty of insane and alluring projects placed before me, their owners starry-eyed, their smiles sincere.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: They wholeheartedly believe they serve 'pure science.' They're the Pioneers of the wilds that we know.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: While all you and your colleagues have to do is evaluate whether inside their experimental plans, their grand blueprints, there lies even the off-chance it might incur the slightest 'cost' or 'waste.'
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: 'Cost.'
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Sometimes it comes in the form of a fertile field, and sometimes it's some number of terminal patients or death row inmates. Sometimes it's a village or a town, and sometimes it's some specific race or even nation.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And as I see it, sometimes, it's their own selves too.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Are you scared of that, Director Jara? Or do the possibilities for science's forward progress excite even you to no end?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Jara, never upon this earth has there existed a specimen of 'pure science' in a glass bell.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Science lies in our hands, in the people's hands. You have to know its temperature, its weight, whether it burns people, whether it will bring suffering or if it will console.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Those people forever claim that they're the way forward, but all they do is set foot with wild abandon in whichever direction they wish to.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But, Silence, that is what progress is.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Nobody knows where the path lies. This is the walk they must take.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The fortunate will find the right place, and enter the light. The misfortunate will run into dead ends, and spin in circles.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But there is no way you can make them stop.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You're a researcher yourself. You know what's most unstoppable of all.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: —It is craving.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Matter can't bind it, morality can't bind it, and rules can't bind it all the same.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Across this land, all throughout history, before Kristen, there were those greedy, egotistical, overreaching, stubborn people you speak of, and when did they ever stop?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And so, from now on, they must stop.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: At the very least, they must stop, before stooping to see just what sits beneath their feet.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Jara, I feel—scientist's fuel should not derive from cravings and ideals, nor should it come from calculations and choices.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Science is a clear, incisive look at every one of us.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, you've said something very beautiful. Fit to be hung in the corridors of a university library.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But I'm afraid not one researcher is willing to see that quote on the walls of their lab.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: It is lip service.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: And so, I will make it practice, Director Jara.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I don't want to give up midway, and I still have your blessing.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence, Kristen has spent a very long time readying this plan. I don't know how much she's poured into it.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But her determination can't be any less than her parents' was.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: You're—
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Fine... this isn't you, it's me.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I can't even watch this. I don't want it all to melt into thin air again.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: In which case, Director Jara, what is it exactly that you hope for? To see Kristen succeed, or to bring her back safe and sound?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I know a researcher who goes by Ruby. Her greatest wish is to clock out on time and retire without hassle.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I just ran across a soldier. I imagine his only wish right now is to get out of this out-of-control S.H.A.F.T. without incident, and then flee the clutches of Trimounts and its scientific loons together with his family.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Is Control's wish any more lofty, compared to theirs?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Because the thing she wants—makes sufficient 'progress?'
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Or is this simply because the feelings between you, and her—are sufficiently close?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Director Jara, you know this isn't fair.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: You can't be this selfish.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: I... am this selfish. I can't use morality and justice to fool myself in order to let you pass.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: We must concede what emotions weigh. Kristen has this dream. I can't just stand here and fold my arms.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Silence, you would understand this, wouldn't you?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But if we can stop Control, she could very well still—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: She won't.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: She won't, child.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I know full well... when she set this project into motion, she never planned to return.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Since long ago—even, since we first met, there has been no... taking back any of this.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Silence, it makes me very happy that you could stand in my way here. I can even say that I support your viewpoint.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: But, as Kristen's...
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: ...family, I still won't let you through.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Go on and show me. Are you really... prepared to bear every word you've said?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: What you face from hereon is more than a single Parvis, or a lone Kristen.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: What you face—is every person that attempts to forge forward.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I will. I must be ready. I promise you this.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: A scientist must press forth, and is bound to press forth.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Perhaps, some—like Control, will be more proficient at the 'forward' portion.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: But there must be someone to step up, and ensure that science—
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: —remains in the people's hands.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: ...'Preserver'...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: I never thought it would truly be you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: But if it is, then how can you be...
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Aiding in a little animal's mad schemes?
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: Or witnessing a young civilization take its first step beyond the cradle?
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: You came too late, 'Doctor.'
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: My wait... has lost all meaning.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.options: Compared to... this, Trimounts has been a drop in the bucket.;......;...I need more explanation.

attributes.content: It's you helping Kristen. She used some means to get in contact with you.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Terra's history, civilizations, languages, races, technological attainments—I have come to know it all through Columbia's networks.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: Hilariously, modern surface information transmission isn't even able to cover the globe, but your methods of mutually assured destruction happen to have evolved with competent efficiency.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: Terra's methods are too primal and reliant on Originium, and with such conversion rates, realizing Kristen's attempt... The energy source required would be outlandish.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: It's near to impossible that Terra could have the technology to solve this enigma. Save for—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: I gave her the last of my blood. May as well supply a new heart than watch over a dying light, perhaps.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: You actually, honestly—
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: —Why do you not regret it? All your efforts over such an immense amount of time... all gone to waste.
attributes.name: Kal'tsit

attributes.content: Yes. Gone to waste.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: I shut the project down personally. The orders were input by myself.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: It's a decision I cannot under any circumstances regret.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: It'll be soon, now. Very soon.
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: A giant tremor ripples out from somewhere far away. The lights within this subterranean space give a few flickers.
This being, calling itself the 'Preserver,' falls silent for a while, then seems to let out a deep breath.

attributes.options: Wh-What's going on?!;......;Could that be the S.H.A.F.T.?

attributes.content: It's only an infant's curious glance—
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: Yet what obstructions is it tasked to overcome?
attributes.name: 'Preserver'

attributes.content: 8:11 P.M., S.H.A.F.T. energy accumulation abnormal
That Rhodes Island corporation has trained you well.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Huff... hff....
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Can you still lift your arms?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: What about yours?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Relax, I buy my health insurance.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Are we going to keep doing this?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: If you're still going to block my way, yes.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Alright, let's keep at it.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Wait, something's not right.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The temperature... Even if the S.H.A.F.T.'s preparing to fire, the temperature here shouldn't have risen this high.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: The army has cut off practically every power source in an effort to stop it charging.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Including every security alarm and control system? Those morons—
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Quick! We have to get out of here!
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: There are still some troops stationed up above, Director Jara. I'm counting on you to get them away.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Where are you headed?
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Power to the control systems has been cut. Why does Control still have remote operation of this place?
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Transmitter response is still strengthening. I... still have a chance.
attributes.name: Silence

attributes.content: Silence!
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: A heatwave washes with a burn past Jara's face. The Liberi researcher she'd never paid particular mind to before now continues straight inward, running deeper into the S.H.A.F.T.'s layers.
Jara is suddenly struck by a feeling that there is nothing, not one thing, that could get in that silhouette's way.
Perhaps, she really can make good on what she promised herself.
She imagines, come that time, that maybe she can be of a little help.
Looks like prep work on the emitter has wrapped up.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: 'Science is a clear, incisive look at every one of us.'
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Hah. I'm no scientist.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Kristen, you'll fly for outer space just like you've been dreaming of...
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: I'm sure of it.
attributes.name: Jara

attributes.content: Nasti, couldn't you choose someplace with a better view?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: At what point can you finally stop ragging on me?
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: When I went to observe in Leithanien, I once saw a local fireworks show. They invited the best composers, just to write for the occasion.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: As the first firework went off, all the musicians started playing in unison. That, my, my, that was a scene of beauty.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Your figures of speech are too deficient. Leithanians wouldn't like you.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: True, and true. But still, we're here today in Trimounts seeing a sight that glitters just as gold.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: A ring floating in the air, drone bullets drawing out raindrops of pure light, splashes of sparks off armor plating...
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Just as good as a fireworks show.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Looking at the clock, it's about time for the climax of the performance.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Here comes the thrilling, stirring sforzando—
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: It's... prettier than I imagined. Rhine Lab ought to be charging all the city-siders enjoying the show.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: It's a success. H.A.M.H.R.R.'s materials and structure have withstood the shock from the energy beam for the time being.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: Next comes the charging and focus phase. As long as we can collect the readings from such high-pressure conditions...
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: I'm afraid at this point, the army and Maylander guys grab their last chance to stop it from fully focusing.
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Aren't you worried about Control?
attributes.name: Justin Jr.

attributes.content: Like she ever needed us to worry.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: We're going the same way. And that's all we are.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: We can only play our own parts well, and then... pray she's lucky.
attributes.name: Nasti

attributes.content: (Sarkaz language) If one day, Kazdel too hangs from the firmament, then I'll engrave your name into my stoves.
attributes.name: Nasti
